name: Bark n Dodge
description:
Bark n Dodge Push monster over the edge by dodging their attacks

Monsters only attack if you bark at then. After that, you have a little bit of time to dodge the attack. To make then fall, you must carefully bark at the right position and move, walking or dashing, to avoid their attack.

You are "Apito", a magical puppy who lives on islands flying in the sky. You got lost and ended up on islands invaded by an army of pigs. You don't have weapons, but you can bark and dodge. (don't worry about push the pigs off the edge, they have parachutes :D)

Controls:

  • Move: Arrows or WASD
  • Dash: Z or J
  • Bark: X or K
  • Reset: R
  • Pause: Escape or P

Credits:

Programming and art done by me (rthurmed)

Sound effects and musics downloaded at OpenGameArt:

  • 63 Digital sound effects (lasers, phasers, space etc.) by Kenney
  • 80 CC0 creature SFX by rubberduck
  • "Puppy Playing in The Garden" by Spring Spring
  • Boss Stage Synth Track by killerfishred

Spoiler/Tips:

On the second level, you need to use the attack of a pig to throw you to the second island. After this, you need to trick the sleep pigs to break the barrels.

On the third level, you need to dash to pass the islands. After dodging, the cannon balls will need to throw the pigs against the balloon
